name: accountPlanAddonCancel
description:
[Cancel additional plan](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203634215-How-Do-I-Cancel-My-Subscription-) of a sub account. The cancellation does not provide refund for the current subscription. The service remains active for the current session. This API can only be used by master accounts that pay all billiing charges of their associated Pro or higher sub accounts. Zoom allows only [approved partners](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/master-account-apis) to use master APIs and manage sub accounts' subscriptions. Email the partner programs team at **partner-success@zoom.us** for more details.

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Heavy`
**Prerequisites:**
* Pro or a higher plan with master account option enabled. * The sub account must be a paid account.
**Scope:** `billing:master`

action.description: The action that needs to be taken for this sub account. Value must be set to "cancel".

comment.description: Additional comments about the cancellation decision.

reason.description:
The reason for the cancellation of plan. Reason options:
`1` - I am no longer working remote.
`2` - I had challenges getting the support I needed.
`3` - Features in the Basic Free Plan are sufficient.
`4` - The expense is too high.
`5` - I purchased the wrong product.
`6` - Paid purchase not needed right now, will repurchase in the future.
